caption: The food was delicious, I recommend the family meal to taste different meats. All the sides we tried were very tasty. The service was exceptional. We will come back very soon to try other dishes!
Food was good but the Saturday special dinosaur beef ribs where sold out when I order not good.
Excellent food, service and environment. Family restaurant
Happy hour great! Chicken wings ( both dry and wet) delicious! Will be back!

Ordered from Uber eats, their BBQ was FANTASTIC... however for the Burger we ordered at $17.50 it was less than satisfying, there was nothing special about the taste or ingredients, it tasted very bland and like a food court burger, I was …
If you like an $18 hamburger or an $18 quarter of a chicken this place is for you. Service is great. But the barbecue sauce is beyond not very good

I went with a small group for lunch. First thing I noticed was how nice and new looking the space is. Very well done. It smelled great, too. A nice waiter took our drink orders. My friend and I specifically ordered sweet tea. We were quite …
Every thing me and my party order was NASTY. Peach baked beans🤢🤢, cole slaw tasted like pumpkin, ribs had no seasoning. Shall I go on?
Very good food and service!
Wow!!! It’s very delicious 🤤
Absolutely the BEST BBQ I have EVER eaten!! We will be going back again and again and again!
I had a half rack of ribs, Mac and cheese and baked beans. It was incredible! We also had the dry and wet wings and again amazing! Service was also top notch. Would absolutely recommend

Worst ribs in Miami, regular brisket and very good wings and fries!  Don’t expect anything similar to Shortys, Flannigans or Hometown BBQ; but yes do, to pay twice as much. They brought all together in 3 mins after taking the order which …

Very happy to have good authentic BBQ in Brickell! Highly recommend checking out and supporting this restaurant!! We really enjoyed our food and the service during our visit. Highly recommend trying the deviled eggs, ribs, pulled pork, mac and cheese (so good), and baked beans! We will be back!! 👏🏼
Good comfort food for meat lovers

Went on a Thursday evening with my family. Food came out quick & we enjoyed it. The appetizers of BBQ deviled eggs & cupcake corn bread were really good. I had the 2 meat plate of brisket & smoked sausage with collards & mac. The meats were …

I had absolutely nothing to say about this restaurant. My girlfriend reminded me to review the food, so... here it is.  I guess.  There is nothing special about the pulled pork we ate today. I would have hoped that a recipe created by four …

While in the Brickell area my family and I decided to have BBQ and we stumbled accross Myron Mixon BBQ. It was meant for us! This place is a hidden gem in the city. The customer service was above what anyone can imagine. From the hostess to …
Great music and excellent ribs!!!!
Amazing service and delicious food!
Excellent service. Super cool hip hosts. Bilingual so I felt very comfortable. The wings were off the chain good! The devil eggs ugh I've had better.
Excellent ribs, upstanding. Great location in the downtown. 4 stars because you always can be better :)
I've had better for 90$ no seasoning no where but on the chicken ...mac and pork n beans both were terrible y'all need to put sugar in them beans and what's the red stuff 🤔🤔🤫🤫never again
Excellent food & polite friendly service!
Great ambiance and great BBQ. Actually got to meet Myron himself, one night.
Fantastic brisket!

I was there with my wife Saturday the 27th of May about 6:30 and they were out of brisket. Didn’t seem busy only about 10 customers. I had the beef rib it was good. The wife had chicken and it tasted like rotisserie chicken with BBQ sauce. …
Absolutely outstanding! We had combo platter, macaroni and cheese, Cole slaw, fries. Fantastic taste to everything and delicious  bbq sauces. Super friendly staff! Couldn't  have been better!!👍👍👍
Brisket and pull pork were excellent.  Brisket had a good smoke and was super tender.  Pull pork was tender and good taste.  Both were yummy

Great service wasnt going to stop the oustide hostess stop us asked us to come in, at first told him no we'll keep looking but after I thought about his customer service we went back. The owner came out asked us how we were doing lets me …
The ribs were terrible..The banana pudding was extra terrible..Over price and over rated..

It was a horrific experience, don’t let there influx of influencers blowing up this restaurant make it seem more then what it is. There is great bbq in Miami and this place has missed the mark and is definitely not it!!! You’ll find Amazing bbq at drinkingpigbbq or hometownbbq

This place is amazing, love the staff!!!!❤️❤️❤️ All the staff were clean and so was the restaurant!!! Such sweet employees and AMAZING FOOD!!!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️ I Most definitely need a place like this in Cleveland!!!❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Absolutely beautiful bathroom is clean food was delicious you should totally try the grilled cheese pop was nice water was nice as always. Give them a five star rating regis was nice✨✨✨✨

(Translated by Google) I ordered a plate with pork belly, brisket and ribs, I must say that the brisket cut was incredible, the ribs were divine too but I expected a better flavor from the pork belly, they didn't really taste anything ️ …
Best bbq in Miami

Superb quality meat and top-notch service.  Tried it once, and my husband and are are becoming regular.  Literally everything on the menu is terrific, and the wine list doesn’t disappoint either. Highly recommend!
Based on the brisket, ribs and pork 3 meat combo it was okay, nothing to rave about.

I had a great experience with my family. Everything we ate was delicious. The quality of the meats was great. Very lean and tasty. The ribs are probably the best I’ve ever had, the brisket was excellent and juicy. The French fries and Mac …
food was AMAZING! bar tenders super friendly great place will be back soon
First time here and the Dino Rib was great.
Not good. Pitmasters come from the states are more  attentive of what they master.

I CANNOT believe how good this place is! It’s fantastic, from the snacks to the main dishes and sides, WOW, literally the best Mac and cheese I’ve ever had, the brisket, pulled pork, corn bread! Not one thing that I’ve had that wasn’t …

We live in Dallas/Fort Worth and if prior to last week had you asked me where some of the best BBQ I have ever had and I told you Miami, FL I may have gotten slapped by my fellow Texans 😂.  With that said.... Some of the best BBQ I have …

Outstanding BBQ, especially for Miami! The ribs were fall off the bone tender, the pulled pork and chicken wee bother very well cooked and seasoned. Not to mention that the brisket wasn’t dry, had great body and still was soft as a pillow. We loved the collard greens and the fries...Just wish some of the other sides were better.
This is the best BBQ place I have ever visited. Lean flavorful meats with outstanding service. Highly recommend putting this place on your list of go too.
Great
2nd trip was even better than the first. Anthony is amazing, interactive and clearly has a love for his craft. Nice to see another westchester county person doing their thing in Miami.

Excellent barbecue.  The druvrub wing were fantastic.  The decor and restaurant is very nice and the staff and management are very attentive and courteous. Great place for a fantastic meal we will surely be back. Highly recommended.
Overpriced for what you get. Service not that good. Chicken wings great! Ribs normal.
Victor our server was so friendly and ready to offer recommendations. He even brought us other flavors of BBQ sauces to try just because he thought we might like them more. Will definitely be back.
Food was good. The service was better than 90 percent of the restaurants in South Florida.
AMAZING RIBS AND WINGS! The mac n’ cheese was also great! Highly recommended!  Service was also quick and friendly!

Best BBQ in the whole Miami area. The ribs are fall off the bone and to die for. Much better value than hometown and more bang for your back. The flavors are authentic and the food is smoked perfectly.
Came down here from West Palm Beach to get some of Anthony BBQ..... AMAZING!!!!!!
Amazing food delivered hot and fresh. Chicken and pulled pork made perfectly. Baked beans and mac and cheese were beyond good. Welcome to Brickell.
Best baby back ribs in Miami! Great brisket too. I'm very happy to see another BBQ joint in the area. Has covid safe outdoor seating.
Loved the wings.
(Translated by Google) Regular  (Original) Regular

BEST BBQ AROUND!! The atmosphere is wonderful, our waiter was very attentive. The food is beyond perfection, the meat couldn’t have been cooked any better. We finished with pecan pie which was phenomenal. Will be back very soon!!

You have to make your way down to Myron Mixons! The chicken wings are incredible, and are must have. Had the brisket and pulled pork platter with Mac and cheese and baked beans, so good! Finished off the meal with the pecan pie and ice cream. There wasn’t a single bad item on the menu, we will be coming back.
This place is absolutely amazing. Food is delish. Atmosphere is fantastic. Service is great.

The service is fantastic! This is something I truly appreciate because typically service around here is terrible. The food was surprisingly good. The meat was fresh, not over cooked, and good flavors.
Very good
Amazing food and a great staff! Had a pleasant experience, the atmosphere and servers were welcoming and the restaurant was very clean. Will definitely be back!
Brisket was dry. Babybacks just ok. Pulled chicken had too much gristle Very disappointed.

Was in the area and decided to swing by to check it out.I didn't get a chance to try the food, parking was a bit challenging for me.I was told to valet park on side of building after calling inside for instructions, because I was not …
Amazing BBQ Restaurant, great service Delicious food

Simply Divine! We ordered both wing flavors. They were cooked to perfection. Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, with great flavors. The sides (baby back mac & fries) were delicious as well. Great southern BBQ, will pig out there again.
Loved it!
The best ribs and pork belly I’ve ever had
Amazing food, service was terrific and definitely coming back!
Service was great, food was just okay. Brisket and the Mac n Cheese was dry. The peach beans were nice.
Great Barbecue right on Brickell and awesome service! Home made bbq sauces and slow cooked brisket. Corn bread and honey butter is over the top good! Great prices.

We sat outside end the street was noisy. They need some plants to block the sound of the street, or they need to play some music. A band would be a nice touch.  The place has decent food, but the ambiance wasn’t there.  Most restaurants …
Great atmosphere and excellent food...also great staff and mellow ambiance.....also very family oriented great for kids amd the entire family 🤛🏽👉🏼✌️
The Baby Back Ribs are amazing!!! A must try! Service is great...place is clean, welcoming ambiance.
Great place ! Great flavors. Nice and friendly service . Food comes to you very fast and hot and we were there on Friday night. Certainly will come back .

3 meat platter (3 ribs, 4 slices brisket, pulled pork, slaw, fries) was plenty to share with my husband. Everything was tender and juicy, beautiful smoke on the brisket, we both favored the pulled pork but wouldn't change the order. Takeout within a block makes this a dangerous new spot 😉
Good service and delicious food

I ordered a brisket beef sandwich, a burger and rib. All the food was cold. The brisket was okay. Burger a disaster  and the rib not fully cooked. Not what you expect from a 4 time barbecue winner. Very disappointed.
Food was incredible! Deviled eggs are to die for. Pork belly and brisket was amazing

Outstanding BBQ! Just went back a second time today and got a rack of ribs and beef brisket takeout to eat during football. I'm editing my original review because the RIBS are now by far my favorite. They are unbelievable and I highly …

I just had the 3 meat plater ( ribs, brisket, sausage ) and it was amazing. Let me also say Ive been to all the best ribs spots in Miami: home town, swine, International's smoke and society bbq.The ribs and brisket are the best in town hand …

Brand new spot, plan on going back anytime I want BBQ. Tried the brisket, pulled pork, potato salad, slaw, and fries. They were nice enough to give us a sample of the pork belly and Brunswick stew as well. Everything was amazing and I would highly recommend.
